name: Portrait In Jazz
description: Portrait in Jazz is an album by American jazz pianist Bill Evans, released in 1960

name: Diamonds
description: Diamonds is a compilation album by British musician and composer Elton John, released in November 2017. It contains the most important songs of his career and generally material from 1970 to 2016
